stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
title: Anemone
